Device ID
CID
MB
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: "app-root", templateUrl: "./app.component.html", styleUrls: ["./app.component.css"], }) export class AppComponent { title = "myApp"; public rowList:any = []; ngOnInit() { console.log("HELLO") this.addRow("","","") } addRow(dvId: string, cId: string, mb: string) { var row = { dvId: dvId, cId: cId, mb: mb }; this.rowList = [...this.rowList,row] } }
